html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08402024-06-26GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Extremist Settler Violence) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (EXTREMIST SETTLER VIOLENCE) REGULATIONS in order to add seven (7) individuals and five (5) entities to the Schedule of the Regulations, directly or indirectly facilitating, supporting, providing funding for or contributing to the use of violence by Israeli extremist settlers against Palestinian civilians or their property in the occupied Palestinian territories, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0155 Publication Date: 2024-07-17
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (EXTREMIST SETTLER VIOLENCE) REGULATIONS in order to add seven (7) individuals and five (5) entities to the Schedule of the Regulations, directly or indirectly facilitating, supporting, providing funding for or contributing to the use of violence by Israeli extremist settlers against Palestinian civilians or their property in the occupied Palestinian territories, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
